name: Google Sheets
description: Read and write Google Sheets spreadsheet data - get values, update cells, append rows
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: sheets_get_values
tools.description: Read cell values from a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Returns a 2D array of cell values for the specified range.

spreadsheet_id.description: The spreadsheet ID (from the URL: docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{id}/)

range.description: The A1 notation range to read, e.g. 'Sheet1!A1:D10' or 'Sheet1!A:A'

tools.name: sheets_update_values
tools.description: Update cell values in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Overwrites existing values in the specified range.

range.description: The A1 notation range to update, e.g. 'Sheet1!A1:B2'

values.description: 2D array of values as a JSON string, e.g. '[["Name","Age"],["Alice",30]]'

tools.name: sheets_append
tools.description: Append rows after the last row with data in a sheet. Values are added below existing content in the specified range.

range.description: The A1 notation range indicating the table to append to, e.g. 'Sheet1!A1:D1'

values.description: 2D array of rows to append as a JSON string, e.g. '[["Alice",30],["Bob",25]]'

tools.name: sheets_clear
tools.description: Clear all values from the specified range in a spreadsheet. Cell formatting is preserved, only values are removed.

range.description: The A1 notation range to clear, e.g. 'Sheet1!A1:D10'

tools.name: sheets_metadata
tools.description: Get spreadsheet metadata including title and sheet names/properties. Useful to discover sheet names and IDs before reading data.

tools.name: sheets_create
tools.description: Create a new empty Google Sheets spreadsheet with the given title. Returns the new spreadsheet ID and URL.

tools.name: sheets_batch_update
tools.description: Execute a batch update on a spreadsheet. Supports adding/deleting sheets, formatting cells, merging cells, sorting, and other structural changes. See Google Sheets API batchUpdate documentation for request types.

requests.description: JSON string of the requests array, e.g. '[{"addSheet":{"properties":{"title":"NewSheet"}}}]'
